SGC 20 1888 Allen & Ginter N29 Geo. F. Miller, [STRIKE]$200[/STRIKE] $150--SOLD--

First come, first served. "I'll take it" trumps any other negotiations.

Email/Ppff [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] or pay by check. Regular paypal, buyer pays the fee.

Email me personally [i.e., not Net54-generated email, which often ends up in my Junk mail]  or post here. No pm's, please, unless necessary.

SOLD on this thread:
Old Judge Ewing is trimmed to the borders, measuring 1 3/8" x 2 5/16", $150.  It is housed in a halved-sleeve, if you notice it.--SOLD--
